Show all display features of the device on the screen with slim landscape window. Demo of a layout that splits the content to sides of a fold or a hinge. Reminder: To use the Test IME bundled with this application, remember to enable it in System Settings. System IME Settings Switch default IME Install window-demos:demo-second-app to launch activities from a different UID. This device does not support Activity Embedding. Please enable PROPERTY_ACTIVITY_EMBEDDING_SPLITS_ENABLED.
